But now a innocent man gets killed and people are fighting for equal rights because from the color of their skin. This should have ended when Martin Luther King Jr spoke his famous  speech. People donâ€™t even have a choice of which skin color or country or race their born into. 

The app also damaged my iPad. It glitched then all the apps on my iPad go erased. After glitching again for a few hours my iPad turned off and I couldnâ€™t turn it back on. 

Please donâ€™t download the app and please make a greater choice in the person who hopefully make America greater then ever.

And yâ€™all are saying that we are writing bad reviews because of TikTok. I like TikTok. It made me happy for once and even if there is drama I barley even focus on that. TikTok may be toxic but mostly itâ€™s just a social platform where we can make fun videos and look at creative and cheerful videos. Iâ€™m not writing this review because of TikTok and I apologize if Iâ€™m hurting anyoneâ€™s feelings but I really do believe in the things that I have said. Bro seriously they would only spy on the USA if the USA did something bad to them. Why canâ€™t we just get along and make an alliance. I know it isnâ€™t my place to say but it just my opinion. They didnâ€™t know ( thatâ€™s the point) Maybe China shouldâ€™ve been more careful but really what if the coronavirus started in the US then would u like your country that you love and care for to get hate from a president. It very hard to explain but if you think about it you shouldnâ€™t blame a country and take down a important platform that people love and put much effort into. What matters is that other countries should work together to get through these rough times. Also China isnâ€™t a disgrace because almost all your things are from and made from China so if I were you I would be very very grateful and not say that China is a disgrace and a disrespectful place.
